options.content:
# Welcome to Picolytics!

Please make this dashboard your own! Delete irrelevant graphs, add new ones, and make things look perfect.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(distinct events.visitor_id) FROM events 
JOIN sessions ON events.session_id = sessions.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(events.created_at) AND sessions.bot = false;

SELECT count(id) FROM sessions WHERE
  $__timeFilter(sessions.created_at) AND sessions.bot = false;

SELECT COUNT(events.id)
FROM events
JOIN sessions ON events.session_id = sessions.id
WHERE $__timeFilter(events.created_at) AND sessions.bot = false;

SELECT   avg(sessions.duration) FROM sessions WHERE
  $__timeFilter(sessions.updated_at) AND sessions.bot = false;

SELECT
    CASE 
        WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL
        ELSE (COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE bounce) * 100.0) / COUNT(*)
    END AS bounce_rate
FROM
    sessions
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(sessions.created_at) AND sessions.bot = false;

SELECT AVG(view_count) AS average_views_per_visit
FROM (
    SELECT s.id, COUNT(e.id) AS view_count
    FROM sessions s
    JOIN events e ON s.id = e.session_id
    WHERE s.bot = FALSE
    AND e.name != 'ping'
    AND $__timeFilter(s.updated_at)
    GROUP BY s.id
) AS session_views;

SELECT COUNT(id)
FROM sessions
WHERE $__timeFilter(sessions.created_at) 
AND sessions.bot = false
AND updated_at > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - '30 minutes'::interval;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(events.created_at, $__interval),
  domains.domain_name as domain,
  COUNT(events.id) as " "
FROM events
JOIN domains ON events.domain_id = domains.domain_id
WHERE
  events.name = 'load'
  AND $__timeFilter(events.created_at)
GROUP BY 1, domains.domain_name
ORDER BY 1, domains.domain_name

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(sessions.updated_at, $__interval),
  sessions.duration
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(sessions.updated_at) AND sessions.bot = false;

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN referrer = '' THEN 'direct'
        ELSE referrer
    END AS referrer,
    COUNT(DISTINCT visitor_id) AS visitors
FROM
    events
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(events.created_at)
GROUP BY
    CASE
        WHEN referrer = '' THEN 'direct'
        ELSE referrer
    END
ORDER BY
    visitors DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
    path,
    COUNT(distinct visitor_id) AS visitors
FROM
    events
WHERE referrer != ''
AND 
  $__timeFilter(events.created_at)
GROUP BY
    path
ORDER BY
    visitors DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT entry_path AS path, COUNT(*) AS visitors
FROM sessions
WHERE bot = FALSE  -- Assuming you want to exclude bot sessions
AND 
  $__timeFilter(sessions.created_at)
GROUP BY path
ORDER BY visitors DESC
LIMIT 10;  -- You can adjust the limit as needed

SELECT exit_path AS path, COUNT(*) AS visitors
FROM sessions
WHERE bot = FALSE  -- Assuming you want to exclude bot sessions
AND $__timeFilter(sessions.created_at)
GROUP BY path
ORDER BY visitors DESC
LIMIT 10;  -- Adjust the limit as needed
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM sessions WHERE $__timeFilter(created_at) LIMIT 50
